description: Weekly online quizzes covering Statistics (10 weekly quizzes) and Linear Algebra (two quizzes in Weeks 3 & 7). Includes MATLAB usage for statistics questions.
40-minute computing lab test in Week 7 covering first 5 weeks' statistics content. Requires MATLAB for data analysis and numerical responses.
1-hour test during Week 9 lecture covering linear algebra topics up to Jordan forms, including definitions, theorems and problem-solving.

2-hour comprehensive exam during official exam period. Equal weighting to linear algebra (matrix exponentials, ODE systems) and statistics (ANOVA, regression). Includes MATLAB tasks and mixed question formats.
